info.description: Create apps and games within the MySpace platform. Monetize through advertising and virtual goods.
info.title: MySpace

post.description: Posts a comment to a status.

parameters.description: Specifies Content Type.
parameters.name: Content-Type

parameters.description: The person's identifier.
parameters.name: personId

parameters.description: Specifies which status or mood to post a comment for.
parameters.name: statusId

parameters.description: Indicates which set of individuals to query for activities. @friends and @all currently can be used interchangeably.
parameters.name: selector

parameters.description: Only returns the nearest multiple of 3 compared to the original value.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The following field names are supported.
parameters.name: fields

get.description: Retrieves item comments from a specified album.

parameters.description: The person's identifier.
parameters.name: personId

parameters.description: Indicates which single album from the group identified by {selector} should be returned.
parameters.name: albumId

parameters.description: Indicates which single media item from the album identified by {albumId} should be returned.
parameters.name: mediaItemId

parameters.description: Only returns the nearest multiple of 3 compared to the original value.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description:
The following field names are supported. Bold fields are always returned.
albumId, created, description, duration, id, language, mimeType, msMediaItemUri, msPrivacyLevel, 
numComments, numViews, numVotes, rating, tags, thumbnailUrl, title, type, url 
@all (a special value that tells the REST endpoint to send back all fields for the MediaItem.)
parameters.name: fields

parameters.description:
MySpace specific field. May be one of the following values:
me - Media item is private.
friendsonly - Media item is visible to friends.
everyone - Media item is visible to everyone.
parameters.name: msPrivacyLevel

parameters.description: Determines the format of the response.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Indicates the index of the first item to retrieve from the query set.
parameters.name: startIndex

parameters.description: The person's identifier.
parameters.name: personId

parameters.description: Indicates the video category about which you want to retrieve data.
parameters.name: categoryId

parameters.description: Only returns the nearest multiple of 3 compared to the original value.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Free form search terms or query words
parameters.name: searchTerms

parameters.description: Number of items to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The culture context of the search. Default is en-us.
parameters.name: culture

parameters.description: Determines the format of the response.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: Which page to start at for the results.
parameters.name: startPage

parameters.description: Determine if searching on tags, as opposed to contents. To enable tag search, set to 1.
parameters.name: tag

parameters.description: Search for specific video types. Two allowed values are videoMode=1 (music videos) or videoMode=2 (official).
parameters.name: videoMode

parameters.description: Free form search terms or query words
parameters.name: searchTerms

parameters.description: Number of items to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: The culture context of the search. Default is en-us.
parameters.name: culture

parameters.description: Determines the format of the response.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: How to sort the images. Default is all.
parameters.name: sortBy

parameters.description: Indicates whether to sort ascending or descending. Default is descending.
parameters.name: sortOrder

parameters.description: Which page to start at for the results.
parameters.name: startPage

parameters.description: Free form search terms or query words
parameters.name: searchTerms

parameters.description: Number of items to return.
parameters.name: count

parameters.description: Country code to search with. Can be used instead of culture.
parameters.name: countryCode

parameters.description: The culture context of the search. Default is en-us.
parameters.name: culture

parameters.description: Distance away from location to return results. Default is in miles, but depending on culture specified, it can be in kilometers.
parameters.name: distance

parameters.description: Determines the format of the response.
parameters.name: format

parameters.description: The gender to filter on. Default is both.
parameters.name: gender

parameters.description: Filter for only those who have a photo. Default those with or without a photo.
parameters.name: hasPhoto

parameters.description: Geographic latitude. Required to be combined with longitude and not combined with location field.
parameters.name: latitude

parameters.description: The location field, such as city, state and/or country.
parameters.name: location

parameters.description: Geographic longitude. Required to be combined with latitude and not combined with location field.
parameters.name: longitude

parameters.description: Minimum age for returned people. Same functionality as the MySpace website search.
parameters.name: minAge

parameters.description: Maximum age for returned people. Same functionality as the MySpace website search.
parameters.name: maxAge

parameters.description: Which field the search should go through. Default is all of the fields. (yomi is only available to ja-jp culture).
parameters.name: searchBy

parameters.description: Which page to start at for the results.
parameters.name: startPage

get.description: Retrieves all application data for a specified user.

parameters.description: The application's ID associated with the OAuth ConsumerKey/ConsumerSecret pair.
parameters.name: appId

parameters.description: The fields correspond to keys in the application data. One uses fields to only retrieve specific keys. If the request omits fields, all application data per user will be returned.
parameters.name: fields
